statement:
gencbval.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
gencbval.2 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
gencbval.3 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
gencbval.4 $e |- ( th <-> E. x ( ch /\ A = y ) ) $.
gencbval $p |- ( A. x ( ch -> ph ) <-> A. y ( th -> ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
